home.hero_description: Nyaaya is committed to providing you with clear, actionable information about Indian law in simple language so you can protect yourself, assert your rights and seek justice.

follow.title: Hey! You can reach us in any of the following ways
follow.cta: Drop us a mail or follow us on social media for updates, news and more

subscribe.cta: Sign up to get updates on new information published, answers to popular questions and more
